issue.message: Security scheme 'api_key' was defined but not used by any operations

repairs.action_taken: Added global security requirement using 'api_key' scheme to ensure all operations require authentication

issue.message: Server URL '/api/rest/v1' at index 0 in '../oak/apis/openapi/files.com/main/0.0.1/openapi.json' must be an absolute URL (e.g., start with http:// or https://).
